PrivacyPage.privacy:
CommiHub is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes your practices with respect to Personal Data (as defined below) that we collect from users of our website, located on CommiHub.com ('Site') and the services available through the Site (' Services'). Additional policies and a description of the services are provided in the CommiHub Terms of Service, which also define the use and restrictions of our Services.

User Consent

By submitting Personal Data through our Site or Services, you accept the terms of this Privacy Policy and expressly agree to the processing of your Personal Data in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Types and use of data we collect

CommiHub collects the following personal information from you when you register and use our Services; Contact information: name, email address, postal address, telephone number, etc. Identity verification information: social security number, date of birth, etc. Payment information: credit card numbers or bank accounts, billing addresses, etc. Additional information provided when using our services or through comments and contacting us, such as, but not limited to; gender, salary, demographic data, marital status, credit card and monthly payment, total amount and interest rates, value of the home.

Other information we collect online

Other information is any information that is not personal information that does not reveal your specific identity or that does not relate directly to a person, such as: Browser information Information collected through cookies, web beacons and other technologies Demographic information and other information provided by you, such as your date of birth or family income Aggregated and unidentified data

Information obtained from third parties p>

If you provide us with personal information about third parties, or if third parties provide us with your information, we will only use it for the specific reason for which it was provided to us. This includes information from credit bureaus, financial institutions or other sources used to improve the use of our Services. Use of your data

In general, Personal Data is used in the following ways: to provide you with the Services to personalize them and to better adapt the features, performance and support of the Services for your use, to send notifications, such as security notices or support and maintenance to answer your questions or other requests to send you promotional / marketing information, newsletters, surveys, offers or other information to provide opportunities and features that we believe would be of particular interest to you to improve the quality of the Site and the Services, to analyze, compare and conduct research on user data and user interactions with the Services to conduct market research, planning, problem solving, planning problems, detecting and protecting against errors, fraud or other criminal activity to request their comments. Other information that CommiHub uses (such as browser information, cookies, etc.) is aggregate information for general purposes; to personalize the content you see, improve our services, develop new services and conduct research. Again, none of this information is linked to your personally identifiable information.

UserTermsPage.terms:
PLEASE CAREFULLY REVIEW THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS BEFORE USING THIS SITE. YOUR USE OF THIS SITE AND, SEPARATELY, YOUR ENROLLMENT IN OUR SERVICES ARE ALL SUBJECT TO THE FOLLOWING TERMS AND CONDITIONS AND ALL APPLICABLE LAWS AND REGULATIONS. PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY. YOUR USE OF THE SITE OR YOUR ENROLLMENT CONSTITUTE YOUR AGREEMENT TO ABIDE BY EACH OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH BELOW. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH ANY OF THESE TERMS OR CONDITIONS, YOU SHOULD EXIT THIS SITE IMMEDIATELY AND NOT VISIT, BROWSE THE SITE OR ENROLL IN OUR SERVICES. YOU AGREE THAT BY USING THE SERVICE YOU REPRESENT THAT YOU ARE AT LEAST 18 YEARS OLD AND THAT YOU ARE LEGALLY ABLE TO ENTER INTO THIS AGREEMENT.

User Agreement

The following are terms of a legal agreement (the 'Agreement') between you (“Landlord” or “Tenant” or “you”) and CommiHub, LLC ('CommiHub', 'we', or 'us'), that sets forth the terms and conditions for your use of this website (the 'Website'). The Website is owned and operated by CommiHub, LLC. This Website is being provided to you expressly subject to this Agreement. By accessing, browsing, and/or using this Website via any medium, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms of this Agreement and to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

Changes to Agreement

We reserve the right to amend this Agreement, at our sole discretion, at any time and may notify you by sending you an email or by posting the updated terms on our website. You should check this Agreement periodically for changes. All changes shall be effective upon posting posting and shall supersede all previous versions. Your continued use of the Site after any change to this Agreement constitutes your agreement to be bound by any such changes. We may terminate, suspend, change, or restrict access to all or any part of this Site without notice or liability.

Last updated – February 1, 2018

Contacting Us

If you have questions regarding this Agreement or the practices of CommiHub, please contact us by email at help@CommiHub.com

AboutUsPage.AboutUs:
Devloper and Founder: Daniel Sasu.

CommiHub is all about providing online services to better serve and connect communities. Our first services focuses on property services such as maintenance requests, community news, reviews and many more. We will be adding more services as time goes on.
